title: Storytelling-Based Early Childhood Literacy Education Design Workshop

context.prior_knowledge: Basic literacy education theory and understanding of scientific research methodologies
context.additional_context: Program for educational administrators/leaders to acquire methods of applying storytelling techniques to early literacy education program design

learning_goals: An instructional design framework combining Gagné’s Nine Events of Instruction with storytelling techniques can be explained
Two or more interactive storytelling instructional materials using digital tools can be developed
Formative assessment tools measuring the effectiveness of literacy education activities for young children can be designed

resources: Sample Early Literacy Assessment Metrics for Young Learners

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
